alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 9:34PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Erie, Genesee, and Wyoming counties. The greatest additional accumulations will focus on central Erie County, including South Buffalo and the immediate eastern suburbs. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult within this band of lake effect snow with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
